snippet: Dale J. Stephens, the founder of UnCollege, explains why high school graduates would do well to skip the college experience.
abstract: Dale J. Stephens, the founder of UnCollege, explains why high school graduates would do well to skip the college experience.
lead_paragraph: Is college worth it? High school seniors anxiously awaiting admissions decisions might find that question bizarre, but recently some strenuous arguments have been leveled against the value of a college degree.

headline.main: Why Go to College at All?
